SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class ChangeNotifications

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.ChangeNotifications
public class ChangeNotifications extends Object
This class acts as a database for all the events notified to the gui.
